name: voxel2fixel
description:
Map the scalar value in each voxel to all fixels within that voxel.

This command is designed to enable CFE-based statistical analysis to be performed on voxel-wise measures.

References:
author: MRTrix3 Developers

inputs.name: fixel_directory_in
inputs.description: the input fixel directory. Used to define the fixels and their directions

inputs.name: fixel_directory_out
inputs.description: the fixel directory where the output will be written. This can be the same as the input directory if desired

inputs.name: fixel_data_out
inputs.description: the name of the fixel data image.

inputs.name: quiet
inputs.description: do not display information messages or progress status; alternatively, this can be achieved by setting the MRTRIX_QUIET environment variable to a non-empty string.

inputs.name: force
inputs.description: force overwrite of output files (caution: using the same file as input and output might cause unexpected behaviour).

inputs.name: nthreads
inputs.description: use this number of threads in multi-threaded applications (set to 0 to disable multi-threading).

inputs.name: config
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

type.name: config
type.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: key
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: value
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: help
inputs.description: display this information page and exit.
